main event: Multiple sightings of a luminous unidentified flying object over Novorossisk, U.S.S.R. between February 27 and March 1, 1958.
interesting points: The object was observed flying very high over mountains, changing direction multiple times at 15-minute intervals., A luminous circular object with a diameter of approximately 30-35 meters was reported by the Turkish Air Force., The object was seen moving in a straight line at a constant altitude of 500-600 meters for about 30 minutes., Similar unidentified flying phenomena had been previously observed in the area but were not reported., There were discussions among military officials regarding the nature of the sightings with suggestions of possible short-range missile operations.
witness description: Turkish Air Force personnel and military officials
